header: Solomon’s Speech and Prayer of Dedication

verse: Then Solomon said, “The Lord has said that he dwells in thick darkness,
but I have truly built a majestic house for you, a place for you to dwell in forever.”
Then the king turned and blessed the whole assembly of Israel, while the whole assembly of Israel was standing there.
Then Solomon stood in front of the altar of the Lord, in the presence of the whole assembly of Israel, and spread out his hands.

Solomon had made a bronze platform and had placed it in the middle of the courtyard. It was seven and a half feet by seven and a half feet square, and four and a half feet tall. He stood on it. Then he knelt in the presence of the whole assembly of Israel, spread out his hands toward heaven,
